data.text: Din pa ye sen ahonya bebrebe;
Ɔdefo ne ohiani wɔ ade baako,
Onitefo hu amanehunu a ɛreba na ohintaw ne ho,
Ahobrɛase ne Awuradesuro
Nsɔe ne mfiri wɔ amumɔyɛfo akwan so,
Kyerɛ abofra ɔkwan a ɔmfa so,
Adefo di ahiafo so,
Nea odua amumɔyɛsɛm no twa ɔhaw
Ɔyamyefo benya nhyira
Pam ɔfɛwdifo na basabasayɛ nso bɛkɔ;
Obi a ɔdɔ koma a mu tew na ne kasa ho yɛ nyam no,
Awurade ani wɛn nimdeɛ,
Ɔkwadwofo ka se, “Gyata bi wɔ mfikyiri hɔ!”
Ɔbea waresɛefo anom yɛ amoa donkudonku;
Agyimisɛm kyekyere abofra koma ho,
Obi besisi ohiani de apɛ ahonya,
Yɛ aso na tie anyansasɛm yi;
efisɛ eye sɛ wokora saa nsɛm yi wɔ wo koma mu,
Sɛ ɛbɛyɛ a wode wo ho bɛto Awurade so,
Menkyerɛw mmɛ aduasa mmaa wo,
a ɛkyerɛkyerɛ wo nokware ne nea akyinnye nni ho,
Mmɔ ahiafo korɔn, sɛ wɔyɛ ahiafo nti,
efisɛ Awurade bedi wɔn asɛm ama wɔn,
Mfa obi a ne koma yɛ den no adamfo,
anyɛ saa a, wubesua nʼakwan
Nyɛ nea ɔde ne nsa hyɛ krataa ase di akagyinamu
na sɛ wunni nea wɔde tua a
Ntutu tete abo a wɔde ato hye,
Wuhu obi a ne nsa akokwaw nʼadwuma ho ana?
